Producer: Robert Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Bradley Thomas
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Stereo, Surround, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: Boy (Chris Klein) meets girl (Heather Graham) ; boy falls in love (and had wild, non-stop sex) with girl; boy loses girl... when they discover they are brother and sister! But when he learns that he's the victim of the ultimate case of mistaken identity, the lovesick young man -- whom everyone still thinks is after some taboo thrills -- must race across the country to stop her from marrying another man.
Title: Say It Isn't So
